mapper.insert: insert into element_info (ele_num, rec_id, ma_id) values (#{ele_num}, #{rec_id}, #{ma_id});
mapper.select: select ele_num, line_qc_id, ei.pro_id, line_qc_defect from element_info ei join work_instr wi on ei.work_id = wi.work_id where wi.work_num = #{work_num};
select ele_num, pr_qc_id, line_qc_defect from element_info ei join product_release pr on ei.pr_id = pr.pr_id where pr.pr_num = #{pr_num};
